column1: Radhrim (Raðrim) was a forested region in eastern Doriath
column2: located between the rivers Aros and Celon.
column4: 189 Although what appears to be the same region is also called Arthórien
column5: it is unknown if these two regions were the same (or if one was situated within the other).

column2: the Doriathrin name Radhrim is glossed as "East-march".
